doc:
Marilyn Harris (actress) https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Marilyn_Harris_(actress) 0 Marilyn Harris (July 17, 1924 – December 1, 1999) was an American child actress who appeared in several Hollywood productions in the 1930s and 1940s. She is best remembered for her role as "Little Maria" in the 1931 horror film Frankenstein. Marilyn_Harris ( July_17_,_1924 – December_1_,_1999 ) was an_American_child_actress who appeared in several_Hollywood_productions in the_1930s_and_1940s . She is_best_remembered for her_role as "_Little_Maria " in the_1931_horror_film_Frankenstein .
